note: All computations verified: h₁² = (1 4)(3 6), h₂² = (1 4)(2 5), h₃² = (2 5)(3 6) are correctly computed from the 4-cycle definitions. These three elements generate the Klein 4-group V₄ = {id, (1 4)(2 5), (1 4)(3 6), (2 5)(3 6)} of order 4, which is correctly identified as the kernel ker(φ) of the block action homomorphism. The structure claim V₄ ≅ Z₂ × Z₂ is correct.
